column1: Smoque BBQ////I literally just finished my meal at smoque
column2: I'm struggling to keep my eyes open as the bus boy takes mine and my girlfriends empty trays away. Â This was my first experience and I could not be more impressed
column3: I'm friends with a lot of very good bbq gurus and this food easily matched them. The sauces were amazing
column5: the food was fast and delicious and very fair priced. Wish I lived in Chicago so I could have it more often.
